_sText:
Hopefully the Final Version of cs_desert_glory.... Looks a lot nicer than before. HDR didn't work on on this map because shiny surfaces became white.... 

Change Log:

-Added / Fixed Stairs instead of Ramps.
-Fixed a lot of leaks and cracks
-Improved lighting
-Added 3d Skybox
-Optimized greatly (130fps average)
-Thickened some paper thin walls
-Thinned out some mega-fat walls
-Fixed walls that protruded out to far
-Added Light Props
-Better inside lighting
-Added physical prop debris and junk
-Improved displacements 
-Tiny other improvements
